Key Match Events: Mohammed Shami took 5 wickets for 54 runs
Pre-Game Insights: India chose Suryakumar Yadav in place of Hardik Pandya
New Zealand were unchanged from its previous win over Afghanistan
Post-Match Reflections: India top the table with their fifth straight win
New Zealand are second after their first loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Daryl Mitchell made a rapid 130 for New Zealand
India removed both the openers early but were sloppy on the field, dropping three catches
Others: The match was played at the HPCA Stadium in Dharamsala, India
Kohli came close to tying the record for most one-day international (ODI) hundreds, held by countryman Sachin Tendulkar with 49
